name: Horror Amusement Park
description:
"Horror Amusement Park" is a thrilling game that puts you in charge of creating your very own horror-themed amusement park. Your goal is to attract as many tourists as possible and give them the scare of their lives.

As the evil wizard behind the park, you'll need to strategically design and develop different areas of the park, including haunted houses, mazes, and other terrifying attractions. You'll need to collect money from visitors and reinvest it back into the park to improve and expand your offerings, making it even scarier and more exciting for your guests.

But be warned, your guests will think it's all just for show. Little do they know, you'll be playing by the real rules, and the scares will be all too real. As they make their way through the park, they'll encounter all sorts of terrifying creatures and monsters, designed to scare them out of their wits.

As the park grows in popularity, you'll have access to more resources and be able to hire even scarier performers to work in your attractions. Your ultimate goal is to become the most talked-about horror park in the world and to earn a reputation as the ultimate master of fear.

Can you create the most terrifying park in the world? Play "Horror Amusement Park" and find out!

Game Features :
- Character upgrading
- Scaring visitors
- Unlimited gameplay
